title: Dangerous Hunts: A Zombie Father's Day Tale
description: The brochure reads: "Dangerous Hunts: If it moves, you can kill it." But the Carters will soon discover that not everything that moves can be killed.At his wife's urging, Matthew Carter takes his new step-son on a Father's Day hunt he will not soon forget.It's open season on the undead, and there's no limit on the amount you can bag.
author: Raymond F. Masters
